cyberpunk_standard.name: Cyberpunk Standard Room
cyberpunk_standard.description: Standard cyberpunk hotel room with neural interfaces

cyberpunk_tech: Neon circuits pulse beneath synthetic skin while data streams cascade through neural networks. The room breathes with electric life, every surface alive with digital consciousness seeking connection.
Chrome and flesh merge in perfect synthesis as quantum processors parse human emotions into machine code. Reality bends at the edges where wetware meets silicon dreams.
Electric synapses fire in harmony with organic neurons, creating hybrid thoughts that exist simultaneously in meat and metal. The boundary between self and system dissolves.
enhanced_awareness: Consciousness expands beyond biological limits as neural enhancers amplify awareness to cosmic scales. Every thought ripples through quantum foam, touching infinite possibilities.
The room exists in superposition - simultaneously shelter and universe, particle and wave. Enhanced perception reveals hidden dimensions folded within familiar space.
Reality layers cascade through consciousness like infinite mirrors reflecting deeper truths. The enhanced mind perceives patterns invisible to unaugmented awareness.
basic_digital: Digital interfaces hum quietly in the background, learning patterns and adapting to presence. Simple sensors track basic metrics while the room slowly awakens.
Basic neural connections establish handshake protocols between organic and digital systems. The foundation of hybrid consciousness takes root in silicon soil.
Elementary AI processes observe and catalog behaviors, building the first layers of understanding between human and machine intelligence.
